packs.pack_description: Makes infested stone blocks appear crumbled and cracked, matching how easy it is to break the block.
Removes the bolts in the corner of Waxed Copper blocks and variants.

message: This does NOT change anything with Cut Copper, so Waxed Copper Items is recommended.

packs.pack_description: Makes all fully aged Amethyst clusters have a shining texture.
Adds flowers to the top of kelp plants when they are fully grown. {age=25}.
Gives Hoppers arrows all around to indicate which direction they are facing.
Gives Observers arrows all around to indicate which direction they are facing and display updates.
Adds arrows to the sides of sculk sensors to indicate the output direction.
Makes unlit Redstone Ore use the same palette as unlit Redstone Wire until its lit, when it then returns to its default, bright red colour.
Shows the empty and full honey stages in Bee Nests and Beehives on all sides.
Adds a border to buttons to make them noticeable.
Marks Pressure Plates with a square to make them noticeable.
Improves the bottom of specific blocks to make them identifiable
Shows a lit texture on all sides for furnaces, blast furncases and smokers.
Adds more textures to respawn anchors to indicate current charge.
Shows an open texture on all sides when barrel is open.
Adds a side texture to indicate a filled Lava Cauldron.
